divs: sighting detailswell as usual i am using the earth cam web site,that views the ny\nj hudson river area. i have been getting some strange pictures of very large crafts over this area. i cant say for sure they are alien in nature, but they are strange to say the least. these web cams are much better then the wired ny web cams i usually use. i think because of the infared capability of the cameras earth cam uses, well maybe thats why i get so many pictures of these big strange objects...lets be honest, in this whole gigantic universe isn't it foolish and down right ignorent to think we are the only life that exists? come on people wake up...ps i was off the air for 3 months...well i'm back and i have awesome pics to proove you non-belivers wrong...peace & love...marko333 !!! watch the skies...there here my friends !!!
Summary: GIANT UFO OVER HUDSON RIVER NJ/NY AREA
trends: there have been no other sightings in nj\ny hudson river
This sighting has never been favorited.
